products.name: Large Gold Glass Rose Appliqué Bauble
products.description: This large gold bauble will add a unique floral accent to traditional Christmas trees. It's crafted from glass and features an intricately detailed red rose appliqué.

products.name: Pine Cone & White Berry Wreath
products.description: Display this 16-inch wreath on your door to bring a festive look to your home. It's made from pine with a snowy effect and finished with eucalyptus, mistletoe berries and pine cones.

products.name: Joy Medium Lantern
products.description: Spread a little joy with this charming lantern. The word 'Joy' is written in a brushscript font in a silver decal, set against a backdrop of stars. The glass lantern is suitable for use with a standard tealight and is fitted with a metal handle.

products.name: 3 Pack Red Velvet Baubles
products.description: Add an extra eye-catching detail to your Christmas tree with this pack of three baubles. This stylish set includes three velvet designs, with a mix of glittery and textured geometric detailing. Each one has a gold metallic top with a metallic thread for easy hanging.

products.name: Red Velvet Alphabet Stocking
products.description: Fill this luxe-looking stocking with little gifts for a thoughtful Christmas touch. It's crafted from plush red velvet and features a gold embroidered design including a letter from the alphabet and snowflakes.

products.name: Large Glass Hanging House Scene Snow Globe
products.description: Bring your dreams of a snowy Christmas to life with this large hanging snow globe. Made from glass, it features a white house scene complete with a glittering roof and a mini Christmas tree. This decoration is topped with a pretty, snow-like splatter and a thin, tinsel trim.

products.name: 3 Pack Red Jewelled Leaf Tree Decorations
products.description: Add a touch of shimmer to your tree with these pretty Christmas decorations. They come as a pack of three, with each featuring red jewelled leaves on gold wire.

products.name: Red Berry Wreath
products.description: With its bright assortment of red berries, this wreath brings a vivid burst of colour to your festive decorations. It's a generous 18 inches in diameter and is woven on a traditional wicker base for extra durability.

products.name: 3 Pack Glass Unicorn Decorations
products.description: Add some magic to your Christmas tree with this set of three glass baubles. This colourful trio features a rainbow, unicorn and ballet shoes, complete with shiny and glitter finishes. The cardboard display box will allow you to store safely for next year too!

products.name: Velvet Joy Slogan Embroidered Cushion
products.description: Give your home some festive flair with this joyful scatter cushion. It features an exquisite embroidered design with a ‘Joy’ slogan surrounded by floral motifs and scattered stars. The square cushion is made from rich velvet fabric for a luxurious feel. Made with recycled polyester filling.
